amendment.description: An amendment numbered 21 printed in Part B of House Report 116-16 to direct the Election Assistance Commission to conduct a study of the best ways to design ballots used in elections for public office to minimize confusion, including paper and digital ballots to minimize confusion and user errors. The EAC must submit to Congress this report no later than January 1, 2020.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Rouda amendment (A019) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A019) offered by Mr. Rouda.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Rouda amendment (A019) Agreed to by voice vote.
